GAME_MAKING.name: Game Development
GAME_MAKING.headline: High-Octane Logic for Modern Gaming
GAME_MAKING.fullDesc: Based in Airdrie, we provide world-class game systems specializing in Lua and C#. With over 2000 hours in Stormworks engineering, we build admin tools, physics-defying logic, and complete standalone prototypes.

SITE_MAKING.name: Web Development
SITE_MAKING.headline: Liquid Glass Web Engineering
SITE_MAKING.fullDesc: We don't just make websites; we forge digital experiences. Utilizing React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, we build blazing-fast portfolios and stores. Locally owned and operated in Alberta.

MAINTENANCE.name: Priority Support
MAINTENANCE.headline: Zero Downtime Architecture
MAINTENANCE.fullDesc: Ongoing maintenance, security patches, and priority bug fixing for your existing systems. Billed monthly.

MYSTERY_CODE.name: Mystery Script
MYSTERY_CODE.headline: Algorithmic Luck of the Draw
MYSTERY_CODE.fullDesc: Receive a random, high-quality utility script from our private archive. Could be a shader, a pathfinder, or a UI kit.
